headline: UnitedHealth Group Faces DOJ Probe And Regulatory Questions For Future Returns
summary: UnitedHealth Group (NYSE:UNH) is under Department of Justice investigation over its Medicare billing practices. The company is also facing policy pressure from a proposed flat increase in Medicare Advantage payments. New federal transparency rules are targeting its pharmacy benefit manager operations. For a company as large and diversified as UnitedHealth Group, with insurance, care delivery, and pharmacy benefit manager businesses tied closely to government programs, these developments go...
